titleStmt.title: The earths encrease. Or, a communion cup: presented to the Kings most excellent Majesty for a New-Yeeres gift. / By the reuerend Father in God, the Bishop of Landaff..
titleStmt.author: Field, Theophilus, 1574-1636.
